mapper.sql: MEMBER_ID, AGENT_NAME, AGENT_SHORT_NAME, OEM_ID, UP_AGENT_ID, REG_NAME, REG_CODE, TAX_CODE, REG_ADDR, LIC_TYPE, LIC_AMT, LEGAL_NAME, IDTYPE, IDNO,CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_MOBILE, CONTACT_ADDR, ZIP_CODE, EMAIL, TELENO, SIGN_NAME, SIGN_DATE, REC_CRET_DTTM, LST_UPD_DTTM, AGENT_STATUS

O.MEMBER_ID, O.AGENT_NAME, O.AGENT_SHORT_NAME, O.OEM_ID, O.UP_AGENT_ID, O.REG_NAME, O.REG_CODE, O.TAX_CODE, O.REG_ADDR, O.LIC_TYPE, O.LIC_AMT, O.LEGAL_NAME, O.IDTYPE, O.IDNO, O.CONTACT_NAME, O.CONTACT_MOBILE, O.CONTACT_ADDR, O.ZIP_CODE, O.EMAIL, O.TELENO, O.SIGN_NAME, O.SIGN_DATE, O.REC_CRET_DTTM, O.LST_UPD_DTTM, O.AGENT_STATUS, A.REMARK, A.USER_NAME, A.CREATE_TIME, A.ERROR_FIELD, A.CREATE_TIME AS AUDIT_TIME, A.AUDIT_ID, A.AUDIT_RESULT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TBL_AGENT_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_AGENT_INFO (MEMBER_ID, AGENT_NAME, AGENT_SHORT_NAME, OEM_ID, UP_AGENT_ID, REG_NAME, REG_CODE, TAX_CODE, REG_ADDR, LIC_TYPE, LIC_AMT, LEGAL_NAME, IDTYPE, IDNO, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_MOBILE, CONTACT_ADDR, ZIP_CODE, EMAIL, TELENO, SIGN_NAME, SIGN_DATE, REC_CRET_DTTM, LST_UPD_DTTM, AGENT_STATUS) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oemId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{upAgentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{licAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{idno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactMobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{contactAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{recCretDttm,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lstUpdDttm,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{agentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into TBL_AGENT_INFO
MEMBER_ID,
AGENT_NAME,
AGENT_SHORT_NAME,
OEM_ID,
UP_AGENT_ID,
REG_NAME,
REG_CODE,

LST_UPD_DTTM,
AGENT_STATUS,

mapper.select:
select count(*) from TBL_AGENT_INFO O inner join TBL_AGNET_AUDIT_RECORD A on O.MEMBER_ID = A.MEMBER_ID where 1=1
and O.MEMBER_ID like '%'||#{memberId}||'%'
and O.AGENT_NAME like '%'||#{agentName}||'%'
mapper.update:
update TBL_AGENT_INFO
MEMBER_ID = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=CHAR},
AGENT_NAME = #{record.agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_SHORT_NAME = #{record.agentShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OEM_ID = #{record.oemId,jdbcType=CHAR},
UP_AGENT_ID = #{record.upAgentId,jdbcType=CHAR},
REG_NAME = #{record.regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_CODE = #{record.regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAX_CODE = #{record.taxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_ADDR = #{record.regAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIC_TYPE = #{record.licType,jdbcType=CHAR},
LIC_AMT = #{record.licAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_NAME = #{record.legalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDTYPE = #{record.idtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
IDNO = #{record.idno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NAME = #{record.contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_MOBILE = #{record.contactMobile,jdbcType=CHAR},
CONTACT_ADDR = #{record.contactAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIP_CODE = #{record.zipCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELENO = #{record.teleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_NAME = #{record.signName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_DATE = #{record.signDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
REC_CRET_DTTM = #{record.recCretDttm,jdbcType=CHAR},
LST_UPD_DTTM = #{record.lstUpdDttm,jdbcType=CHAR},
AGENT_STATUS = #{record.agentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},

update TBL_AGENT_INFO set MEMBER_ID = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=CHAR}, AGENT_NAME = #{record.agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_SHORT_NAME = #{record.agentShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OEM_ID = #{record.oemId,jdbcType=CHAR}, UP_AGENT_ID = #{record.upAgentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, REG_NAME = #{record.regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_CODE = #{record.regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAX_CODE = #{record.taxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_ADDR = #{record.regAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIC_TYPE = #{record.licType,jdbcType=CHAR}, LIC_AMT = #{record.licAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL_NAME = #{record.legalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDTYPE = #{record.idtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, IDNO = #{record.idno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{record.contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_MOBILE = #{record.contactMobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, CONTACT_ADDR = #{record.contactAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIP_CODE = #{record.zipCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELENO = #{record.teleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN_NAME = #{record.signName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN_DATE = #{record.signDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, REC_CRET_DTTM = #{record.recCretDttm,jdbcType=CHAR}, LST_UPD_DTTM = #{record.lstUpdDttm,jdbcType=CHAR}, AGENT_STATUS = #{record.agentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}

update TBL_AGENT_INFO
AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_SHORT_NAME = #{agentShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OEM_ID = #{oemId,jdbcType=CHAR},
UP_AGENT_ID = #{upAgentId,jdbcType=CHAR},
REG_NAME = #{regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_CODE = #{regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAX_CODE = #{taxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_ADDR = #{regAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIC_TYPE = #{licType,jdbcType=CHAR},
LIC_AMT = #{licAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_NAME = #{legalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDTYPE = #{idtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
IDNO = #{idno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_MOBILE = #{contactMobile,jdbcType=CHAR},
CONTACT_ADDR = #{contactAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELENO = #{teleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_NAME = #{signName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
REC_CRET_DTTM = #{recCretDttm,jdbcType=CHAR},
LST_UPD_DTTM = #{lstUpdDttm,jdbcType=CHAR},
AGENT_STATUS = #{agentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
where MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=CHAR}

update TBL_AGENT_INFO set AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_SHORT_NAME = #{agentShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OEM_ID = #{oemId,jdbcType=CHAR}, UP_AGENT_ID = #{upAgentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, REG_NAME = #{regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_CODE = #{regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAX_CODE = #{taxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_ADDR = #{regAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIC_TYPE = #{licType,jdbcType=CHAR}, LIC_AMT = #{licAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL_NAME = #{legalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDTYPE = #{idtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, IDNO = #{idno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_MOBILE = #{contactMobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, CONTACT_ADDR = #{contactAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELENO = #{teleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN_NAME = #{signName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, REC_CRET_DTTM = #{recCretDttm,jdbcType=CHAR}, LST_UPD_DTTM = #{lstUpdDttm,jdbcType=CHAR}, AGENT_STATUS = #{agentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR} where MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from TBL_AGENT_INFO O inner join TBL_AGNET_AUDIT_RECORD A on O.MEMBER_ID = A.MEMBER_ID where 1=1
and O.MEMBER_ID like '%'||#{memberId}||'%'
and O.AGENT_NAME like '%'||#{agentName}||'%'
order by A.CREATE_TIME DESC
